section.title: Assigning technical names to component names
section.para: Once you have collected the technical names from the AUT, you can ”assign” them to the component names using drag-and-drop. In this way, you are telling your test which real component you are referring to in each Test Step.
The fact that the object map is separate from the specification means that any changes that need to be made to update a test only need to be made once.
